thread.title: Judge: Don't call Charles Pugh pedophile at grooming trial

title: Judge: Don't call Charles Pugh pedophile at grooming trial
text:
Published By: Detroit Free Press - Today 
Ex-councilman can argue his teen accuser welcomed his advances, but can't bring up boy's other sexual relationships. ...
